author: dims
msg: Fold in common into core. Rational is as follows:
In preparation for Maven2, which mandates 1 jar per module, i'd like
to propose collapsing common module into core and renaming the code to
kernel  So that it produces a axis2-kernel.jar. This will reflect the
current maven.xml's behavior which creates a axis2-kernel.jar. BUT
with one caveat, the current kernel.jar has the code from java2wsdl
module as well. I'd like to keep this separate as it does not depend
on code in core/kernel and is needed by tuscany folks. So basically we
will be collapsing 3 modules producing 1 jar currently
